contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Christopher}} '''Christopher''' may refer to: * [[Christopher (given name)]] {{tocright}} == People == * [[Saint Christopher]] (died 251), saint venerated by Catholics and Orthodox Christians * [[Christopher (singer)]] (born 1992), Danish singer * [[Christopher Bengtsson]] (born 1993), Swedish professional ice hockey player * [[Christopher Columbus]] (1451–1506), navigator, explorer, and colonizer who captained the first European ship to reach the Americas * [[Christopher E. Gerty]] (born 1975), American aerospace engineer and aquanaut * [[Christopher Hitchens]] (1949–2011), English American author and journalist * [[Christopher Lee]] (born 1922), English actor and singer * [[Christopher Lekapenos]] (died 931), Byzantine co-emperor * [[Christopher Marlowe]] (1564–1593), English dramatist * [[Christopher Nolan]] (born 1970), British-American film director and producer * [[Christopher of Bavaria]] (1416–1448), union king of Denmark (1440–1448), Sweden (1441–1448) and Norway (1442–1448) * [[Christopher of Prague]] (born 1953), primate-elect of the Church of the Czech Lands and Slovakia * [[Christopher of Werle]] (died 1425), Prince of the Wends * [[Christopher Pike (author)]] (born 1954), American author * [[Christopher Plummer]] (born 1929), Canadian actor * [[Christopher Reeve]] (1952–2004), American actor * [[Christopher Robin Milne]] (1920–1996), son of author A. A. Milne * [[Christopher Walken]] (born 1943), American actor * [[Christopher Wren]] (1632–1723), English architect * [[Prince Christopher of Greece and Denmark]] (1888–1940), son of George I, King of Greece == Fictional characters == * [[Christopher Pike (Star Trek)|Christopher Pike (''Star Trek'')]], captain of the USS ''Enterprise'' in the first ''Star Trek'' pilot ("The Cage") and in ''Star Trek'' (2009 film) * [[Christopher Robin]], character in the Winnie-the-Pooh books by A. A. Milne == Other uses == * [[Christopher (The Sopranos)|"Christopher" (The Sopranos)]], an episode of the American TV series ''The Sopranos'' * [[Christopher, Illinois]], a city in the United States * [[Christopher, Kentucky]] * [[Christopher, Washington]], a former community in the United States * [[Christopher (Sleep album)|''Christopher'' (Sleep album)]] * [[Christopher (The Ruby Suns album)|''Christopher'' (The Ruby Suns album)]] == See also == * [[Chris]] * [[Christoph (disambiguation)]] * [[Christophe (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
